Text: New INSIGHTS from Bill BrightPST You are receiving this email because you are subscribed to one or more email newsletters from Crosswalkcom Once in a while we have information we need to share with our subscribers We promise we wont bombard your inbox Dear Friends We wanted to briefly let you know about some new newsletters from Crosswalkcom that you may not want to miss INSIGHTS from Bill Bright Beginning in midFebruary Dr Bill Bright will be sharing his heart in this daily email You will be encouraged and inspired by his reflections on a lifetime of ministry Dr Bright founder and chairman of Campus Crusade for Christ says In my remaining time on this earth I want to communicate certain precious truths I have learned to as many people as possible Dont miss this opportunity to sit at his feet Click here to subscribe If this link wraps and is not clickable copy and paste the entire link into your browser updatehtmsubVudWFWFSES The Single Truth Lori Smiths articles offer a fresh perspective on singleness If you feel like you dont fit in at church if youre tired of meat markets and setups or wonder what God is doing with your life this newsletter is for you Lori says I think many singles feel like theyve missed the boat somewhere and arent receiving Gods best for their lives Thats just not true Click here to subscribe updatehtmsubVudWFWFSES Films Faith Weve redone our Movies newsletter to give you the most useful information Each week get overviews and links to the latest movie reviews before you make your weekend plans Reviewer Holly McClure offers a unique Christian perspective and makes sure that you have all the information you need to decide if a movie is appropriate for you and your family Click here to subscribe updatehtmsubVudWFWFSES Youll find more than additional newsletters including devotionals the latest Christian music news reviews religion news home schooling guidance and more at Thanks The Staff at Crosswalkcom To unsubscribe from this list immediately click here UMUASPA or send an email to You will be taken off the list immediately Please note we use this list sparingly and for information that we consider very important for our email newsletter subscribers By unsubscribing you may miss important information regarding your newsletter subscriptions If you have questions send them to us at

A little Christmas bonusYou are receiving this email because you are subscribed to one or more email newsletters from Crosswalkcom Once in a while we have information we need to share with all of our subscribers We promise we wont bombard your inbox Dear Crosswalkcom subscriber Wed like to send you great deals on the latest books and Christian music alert you to intriguing Web sites and let you know of ways you can pray for and assist in crisis situations around the world Dont miss out Click here to be included in our Crosswalk Presents newsletter UMTASPAdrctVudWFWFSES Well email you occasionally with special offers from our sponsors Well NEVER sell or rent your email address to anyone else AND By signing up today youll receive a coupon toward a purchase at Family Christian Stores Web site Go ahead get a jump on your Christmas shopping at Family Christian Stores Web site and sign up for more great deals delivered to your in box Click here UMTASPAdrctVudWFWFSES Expires No cash value One coupon per customer not valid with any other offers Well email you the coupon code after you sign up To unsubscribe from this list immediately click here UMUASPA or send an email to You will be taken off the list immediately Please note we use this list sparingly and for information that we consider very important for all of our email newsletter subscribers By unsubscribing you may miss important information regarding your newsletter subscriptions If you have questions send them to us at
